name: Cave Lizard
description:
Note: If game is unresponsive to keyboard input, click on game area and then try again.

CONTROLS:

Z - FIRE

UP/DOWN ARROWS - to move up and down

OBJECTIVE:

Shoot balloons to knock the cavemen out of the air before they land. Try not to aim at the cavemen directly, as their shields will block your shot.


DOWNLOADS:

Download original Pico-8 cart and source here
